SELECT MPIM.COMPANY_CD , MPIM.DIVISION_CD , MPIM.INOUT_NO AS DEPARTURE_NO , MPIM.INOUT_NO AS KEY_ID , MPIM.INOUT_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0012', MPIM.CURRENCY_CD, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS INOUT_TYPE_NM , MPIM.TITLE AS DEPARTURE_TITLE , MPIM.VENDOR_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PARTNER_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD,MPIM.DIVISION_CD,MPIM.VENDOR_CD) FROM DUAL) AS VENDOR_NM , MPIM.DEPARTURE_VENDOR_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PARTNER_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD,MPIM.DIVISION_CD,MPIM.DEPARTURE_VENDOR_CD) FROM DUAL) AS DEPARTURE_VENDOR_NM , MPIM.DEPARTURE_LOCATION_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOCATION_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD,MPIM.DIVISION_CD,MPIM.DEPARTURE_LOCATION_CD) FROM DUAL) AS DEPARTURE_LOCATION_NM , MPIM.IQC_FLAG , MPIM.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MPIM.CURRENCY_CD, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MPIM.EXCHANGE_RATE , TO_CHAR(MPIM.DEPARTURE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DEPARTURE_DATE , MPIM.AMOUNT AS DEPARTURE_AMOUNT , MPIM.VENDOR_INVOICE , MPIM.DESCRIPTION , MPIM.CREATE_BY AS CREATE_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, MPIM.CREATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS CREATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MPIM.CREATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_MST MPIM WHERE MPIM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPIM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPIM.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{createDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{createDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 AND MPIM.STATE = 'PIG' -- 등록 AND MPIM.INOUT_TYPE = 'DD' -- 납품서-내자거래
AND UPPER(MPIM.INOUT_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{departureNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND MPIM.VENDOR_CD = #{vendorCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND UPPER(MPIM.TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{departureTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND MPIM.CURRENCY_CD = #{currencyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MPIM.IQC_FLAG IN (${iqcFlag})
ORDER BY MPIM.INOUT_NO

SELECT MPID.COMPANY_CD , MPID.DIVISION_CD , MPID.INOUT_NO AS DEPARTURE_NO , MPID.SEQ , MPID.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID , MPID.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MI.PURCHASE_UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, MI.PURCHASE_UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS PURCHASE_UNIT_NM , MPID.INOUT_QTY AS DEPARTURE_REQUEST_QTY , MPID.UNIT_PRICE , MPID.AMOUNT , MPID.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MPID.PO_OVER_RECEIPT_RATE , MPID.DESCRIPTION , MPID.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID , MPID.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL MPID , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPID.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPID.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPID.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.INOUT_NO = #{departureNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MPID.INOUT_NO , MPID.SEQ
